awd_abstract_narration: The Rocky Mountain Biological Laboratory (RMBL) is an                           independent, nonprofit field station with mo institutional                      affiliation, which provides facilities for researchers who wish                 to study high-altitude biology in a field setting.  Researchers                 have come to the RMBL for six decades, and during that time have                patiently put up with exceedingly inadequate housing.  Recent                   facilities grants from the NSF have assisted with new cabin                     construction.  This proposal will provide funds for renovation of               three existing researcher cabins.  One of these is an historic                  structure 112 years old, and improvements at this stage will                    prolong their useful life for at least another three decades.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE CORPORATION OF THE ROCKY MOUNTAIN BIOLOGICAL LABORATORY AT GOTHIC
